desc: Rugs, carpets & decor that win hearts & awards. Customer service rated and trusted by many. That's the Living DNA promise. We are the only store in Singapore that specialises in modern rugs & decor that complete your look be it Luxe, Contemporary, Boho Chic, Scandi for Living Rooms, Bedrooms, Outdoor, Kids Room Runners

layout.text: A fast Singapore-specific guide to help you choose the right rug for your home.
